levels.levelDescription: Embark on a journey through the Whispering Woods, where the dark-grass paths lead you deeper into the heart of mystic secrets. Beware of the deep-dark-holes that hide beneath the shadows, ready to swallow the unwary traveler.
Ascend the Frozen Peaks, where the snow-covered terrain glistens under the pale moonlight. Traverse carefully as icy waters flow through treacherous paths, threatening to freeze any misstep in time.

Explore the ancient Rusty Ruins, where rusty-chain-platforms hang precariously over molten lava pits. Delve into the depths of forgotten civilizations, but beware the fiery wrath that consumes all in its path.
